name: Copley House - Standard King
neighborhood_overview: Back Bay is one of Boston's finest neighborhoods. It is close to tourist attractions, shopping and dining. It offers easy access to most other parts of the city either by subway or on foot.
description:
Copley House is comprised of apartments spread across multiple townhouses in Boston's Back Bay neighborhood. The King Studio can sleep up to 2 guests. Sleeping accommodations include 1 king bed.

The space
Perfect for a romantic getaway, our King Studio provides all the amenities you need to enjoy a relaxing stay in Boston. This studio room features amenities like a full kitchen, a plush, king-sized mattress, flat screen TV, and a private bathroom equipped with complimentary toiletries.

Guest access
There are no parts of the apartment that are shared with other guests.

Other things to note
ID and credit card for incidentals are required for check in.

License number
Exempt: This listing is a hotel or motel
